item.title: By: Peter Childs
item.dc:creator: Peter Childs
item.description:
I've been following HobbyPrincess (http://ullamaaria.typepad.com/hobbyprincess/) A finnish PHD student and crafter who has been promoting "ThingLinks" http://www.thinglinks.com/docs/create over the past year. Simple tags to find unique items - and in my mind a critical tool for the emergence of a 'craft' economy.
Sounds a lot like Sterling 'Internet of things."
item.content:encoded:
I’ve been following HobbyPrincess (http://ullamaaria.typepad.com/hobbyprincess/) A finnish PHD student and crafter who has been promoting “ThingLinks” http://www.thinglinks.com/docs/create over the past year. Simple tags to find unique items – and in my mind a critical tool for the emergence of a ‘craft’ economy.

Sounds a lot like Sterling ‘Internet of things.”
